entities.description: Instances where an individual's mental health treatment needs are not met.
The belief that one could handle mental health issues without professional help.
Concerns that family, friends, or religious groups would disapprove of seeking mental health treatment.
Fear of being committed to a hospital or forced into treatment involuntarily.
Concerns about being advised to take medication for mental health issues.
The belief that mental health treatment would not be effective.

relationships.description: Indicates that the individual's mental health treatment needs are unmet.
Belief that they could handle mental health issues on their own as a reason for unmet treatment need.
Concerns about disapproval from family, friends, or religious groups as a reason for unmet treatment need.
Fear of being committed to a hospital or forced into treatment as a reason for unmet treatment need.
Concerns about being advised to take medication as a reason for unmet treatment need.
Belief that treatment would not help as a reason for unmet treatment need.
